todos.title: Customer’s Purchasing Power
todos.body: What is customer’s annual revenue/net worth?

todos.title: Listening Power
todos.body: Is the customer willing to listen and take advice?

todos.title: Timing Work
todos.body: When does customer need project completed?  Are they patient?

todos.title: Gut
todos.body: What is their gut score (A, B, C, D, F).

todos.title: Innovation
todos.body: How much of their business is making money from services from services or products introduced in the last five years.

todos.title: Vulnerability
todos.body: How much are the clients willing to open up.  Is there a personal connection?

todos.title: Expectations
todos.body: Does the customer have reasonable expectations?

todos.title: Personality
todos.body: Are they enjoyable to work with?

todos.title: Referrals
todos.body: Actual referrals and potential for future referrals.
